FuncDef: This command specifies the local ID for 7750 SRs used for IDi or IDr for IKEv2 tunnels.
CLIs: local-id type { ipv4 | fqdn | ipv6 } [ value <value> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the type of local ID payload, it could be IPv4 or IPv6 address/FQDN domain name, distinguish name of subject in X.509 certificate.
Specifies to use IPv4 as the local ID type, the default value is the local tunnel end-point address.
Specifies to use IPv6 as the local ID type, the default value is the local tunnel end-point address.
Specifies to use FQDN as the local ID type. The value must be configured.
Specifies the data type as an enumerated integer that describes the local identifier type used for IDi or IDr for IKEv2 up to 255 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Depends on local-auth-method like following:Psk:local tunnel ip address 
Cert-auth: subject of the local certificate
